channel.title: Comments on: An Embarrassment of Riches
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Lenny Balsera
item.dc:creator: Lenny Balsera
item.description: It can be a good thing. One of the things this phenomenon has done is really forced me to examine my expectations, standards, and preferences for media. I feel like I've become a lot more discerning of a consumer - for example, whereas I once would pretty much watch anything in a particular genre, like sci-fi, now it has to really grab me for me to commit my time to it.
item.content:encoded: It can be a good thing. One of the things this phenomenon has done is really forced me to examine my expectations, standards, and preferences for media. I feel like I’ve become a lot more discerning of a consumer – for example, whereas I once would pretty much watch anything in a particular genre, like sci-fi, now it has to really grab me for me to commit my time to it.
